long_description: Capped with a top lid, the Osprey Stratos 26 Pack is a well-ventilated and comfortable companion for quick scrambles and other done-in-a-day adventures. Lightweight alloy frame, cross struts and a tensioned mesh back panel give you support and flexibility while carrying heavy loads. Breathable mesh and molded waffle foam cushion contact points on shoulder straps and hipbelt; hipbelt has forward-pull closure. Internal sleeve with hanger holds a hydration reservoir (sold separately); single port and stretch webbing on the shoulder straps secure the drinking tube. Large, zippered front pocket is ideal for stashing a jacket, books and other often-used essentials. Mesh side pockets; zippered top pocket; zippered mesh pockets on hipbelt and right shoulder strap. The Osprey Stratos 26 Pack has an integrated raincover, top grab handle, trekking pole attachment point and single ice axe attachment loop with a central handle clip. Closeout.
short_description: Capped with a top lid, the Osprey Stratos 26 Pack is a well-ventilated and comfortable companion for quick scrambles and other done-in-a-day adventures.
